name: BlackDuckSecurityScan
description: Run security scans on Polaris, Black Duck SCA, Coverity or Software Risk Manager (SRM) platforms
author: Black Duck Software Inc.

inputs.name: bridgeCliDownloadUrl
inputs.label: Bridge CLI Download URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the URL from where bridge-cli-bundle zip file can be downloaded. Note: You must provide the full download url which includes the zip file path.

inputs.name: bridgeCliDownloadVersion
inputs.label: Bridge CLI Download Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the specific Bridge CLI version you want to download from Black Duck artifactory.

inputs.name: bridgeCliInstallDirectory
inputs.label: Bridge CLI Installation Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Bridge CLI installation directory on the agent where it will be installed during the build.

inputs.name: networkAirgap
inputs.label: Network Airgap
inputs.helpMarkDown: If provided, Black Duck Task will be using local network to download and execute bridge-CLI.

inputs.name: networkSslTrustAll
inputs.label: Trust All SSL Certificates
inputs.helpMarkDown: TrustALL -> Disables SSL certificate verification. Use with caution.

inputs.name: networkSslCertFile
inputs.label: SSL Certificate File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Cert file path -> Path to a file that includes one or more trusted CA certificates. Supported formats: PEM, CRT.

inputs.name: scanType
inputs.label: Product
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select Required Product

inputs.name: polarisServerUrl
inputs.label: URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL for Polaris Server.

inputs.name: polarisAccessToken
inputs.label: Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access token for Polaris Server with proper authorization.

inputs.name: polarisAssessmentTypes
inputs.label: Assessment Types
inputs.helpMarkDown: Polaris assessment types. Supported values: SCA or SAST or both SCA, SAST

inputs.name: polarisTestScaType
inputs.label: SCA Test Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Polaris test type to trigger signature scan or package manager scan. Default value: SCA-PACKAGE. Supported values: SCA-PACKAGE or SCA-SIGNATURE

inputs.name: polarisTestSastType
inputs.label: SAST Test Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Polaris test type to trigger sigma rapid scan or full scan. Supported values: SAST_RAPID or SAST_FULL

inputs.name: polarisProjectDirectory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project source directory. Defaults to repository root directory. Set this to specify a custom folder that is other than repository root

inputs.name: polarisMarkBuildStatus
inputs.label: Mark Build Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the build status to use if policy violating issues are found. Default value: Failed. Supported values are: Failed, SucceededWithIssues and Succeeded.

inputs.name: polarisAzureToken
inputs.label: Azure Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: PAT or System.AccessToken has to be passed with legitimate access when Polaris PR comment and Polaris Create SARIF is enabled.

inputs.name: polarisIncludeDiagnostics
inputs.label: Include Diagnostics
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bridge CLI diagnostics will be uploaded in Artifact. Supported values: true or false

inputs.name: polarisWaitForScan
inputs.label: Wait For Scan Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies if the workflow should wait for the analysis to complete. Default value: true. If set to false, post merge workflows like PR comment, SARIF etc will not be applicable.

inputs.name: polarisApplicationName
inputs.label: Polaris Application
inputs.helpMarkDown: Application name in Polaris Server. If not provided, Azure repository name will be set as default value.

inputs.name: polarisProjectName
inputs.label: Polaris Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project name in Polaris Server. If not provided, Azure repository name will be set as default value.

inputs.name: polarisBranchName
inputs.label: Polaris Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name in Polaris Server.

inputs.name: polarisAssessmentMode
inputs.label: Assessment Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: The test mode type of this scan. Supported values: CI or SOURCE_UPLOAD, Default: CI

inputs.name: projectSourceArchive
inputs.label: Upload Archive Instead Of Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The zipped source file path. It overrides the project directory setting above

inputs.name: projectSourceExcludes
inputs.label: Project Source Excludes
inputs.helpMarkDown: A list of git ignore pattern strings that indicate the files need to be excluded from the zip file.

inputs.name: projectSourcePreserveSymLinks
inputs.label: Project Source Preserve SymLinks
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag indicating whether to preserve symlinks in the source zip

inputs.name: polarisPrCommentEnabled
inputs.label: Add Comments to Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add automatic pull request comment based on Polaris scan result. Supported values: true or false. Requires Azure Token.

inputs.name: polarisPrCommentSeverities
inputs.label: PR Comment Severities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of severities. Comments are created for issues where the issue severity matches one of the values specified using this option. Supported values: CRITICAL,HIGH,MEDIUM,LOW,INFORMATIONAL

inputs.name: polarisBranchParentName
inputs.label: Parent Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Parent Branch name in Polaris.

inputs.name: polarisReportsSarifCreate
inputs.label: Generate SARIF Report
inputs.helpMarkDown: SARIF report will be uploaded as a Artifact.

inputs.name: polarisReportsSarifGroupSCAIssues
inputs.label: Group SCA Issues by Component
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uncheck this to disable grouping by component and list SCA issues by vulnerability.

inputs.name: polarisReportsSarifFilePath
inputs.label: SARIF Report File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path (including file name) where SARIF report is created.

inputs.name: polarisReportsSarifSeverities
inputs.label: SARIF Report Severities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of issue severities to include in SARIF report. Supported values: CRITICAL,HIGH,MEDIUM,LOW.

inputs.name: polarisReportsSarifIssueTypes
inputs.label: SARIF Report Issue Types
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of issues types to include in SARIF report. Supported values: SAST,SCA.

inputs.name: coverityUrl
inputs.label: URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL for Coverity platform.

inputs.name: coverityUser
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username for Coverity.

inputs.name: coverityUserPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for Coverity.

inputs.name: coverityProjectDirectory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project source directory. Defaults to repository root directory. Set this to specify a custom folder that is other than repository root

inputs.name: coverityMarkBuildStatus
inputs.label: Mark Build Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the build status to use if policy violating issues are found. Default value: Failed. Supported values are: Failed, SucceededWithIssues and Succeeded.

inputs.name: coverityAzureToken
inputs.label: Azure Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: PAT or System.AccessToken has to be passed with legitimate access when Coverity PR comment is enabled.

inputs.name: coverityLocal
inputs.label: Run Coverity Analysis Locally
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to run analysis locally. If unchecked, scan will be performed on scan farm.

inputs.name: CoverityIncludeDiagnostics
inputs.label: Include Diagnostics
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bridge CLI diagnostics will be uploaded in Artifact. Supported values: true or false

inputs.name: coverityWaitForScan
inputs.label: Wait For Scan Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies if the workflow should wait for the analysis to complete. Default value: true. If set to false, post merge workflows like PR comment etc will not be applicable.

inputs.name: coverityProjectName
inputs.label: Coverity Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project name in Coverity. If not provided, Azure repository name will be set as default value.

inputs.name: coverityStreamName
inputs.label: Coverity Stream
inputs.helpMarkDown: Stream name in Coverity. If not provided, for non-PR context Azure repository name concatenated with source branch name (i.e. testRepo-feature1) and for PR context Azure repository name concatenated with target branch name (i.e. testRepo-main) will be set as default value.

inputs.name: coverityPolicyView
inputs.label: Coverity Policy View
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name/ID number of a saved view to apply as a 'break the build' policy.

inputs.name: coverityVersion
inputs.label: Coverity Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of Coverity Thin Client to use.

inputs.name: coverityPrCommentEnabled
inputs.label: Add Comments to Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add automatic pull request comment based on Coverity scan result. Supported values: true or false. Requires Azure Token.

inputs.name: coverityBuildCommand
inputs.label: Build Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build command for Coverity

inputs.name: coverityCleanCommand
inputs.label: Clean Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Clean command for Coverity

inputs.name: coverityConfigPath
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Coverity config file path (.yaml/.yml/.json).

inputs.name: coverityArgs
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional Coverity Arguments separated by space.

inputs.name: coverityInstallDirectory
inputs.label: Installation Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Coverity installation directory on the agent where it will be installed during the build.

inputs.name: coverityBuildCommandForPolaris
inputs.label: Build Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build command for Coverity.

inputs.name: coverityCleanCommandForPolaris
inputs.label: Clean Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Clean command for Coverity.

inputs.name: coverityConfigPathForPolaris
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Coverity config file path (.yaml/.yml/.json).

inputs.name: coverityArgsForPolaris
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional Coverity Arguments separated by space.

inputs.name: coverityBuildCommandForSrm
inputs.label: Build Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build command for Coverity.

inputs.name: coverityCleanCommandForSrm
inputs.label: Clean Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Clean command for Coverity.

inputs.name: coverityConfigPathForSrm
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Coverity config file path (.yaml/.yml/.json).

inputs.name: coverityArgsForSrm
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional Coverity Arguments separated by space.

inputs.name: coverityExecutionPath
inputs.label: Coverity Execution Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Coverity execution path on the agent where it will be installed during the build.

inputs.name: blackduckScaUrl
inputs.label: URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL for Black Duck SCA server.

inputs.name: blackduckScaToken
inputs.label: Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: API token for Black Duck SCA Server with proper authorization.

inputs.name: blackduckScaProjectDirectory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project source directory. Defaults to repository root directory. Set this to specify a custom folder that is other than repository root

inputs.name: blackduckScaMarkBuildStatus
inputs.label: Mark Build Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the build status to use if policy violating issues are found. Default value: Failed. Supported values are: Failed, SucceededWithIssues and Succeeded.

inputs.name: blackduckScaAzureToken
inputs.label: Azure Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: PAT or System.AccessToken has to be passed with legitimate access when BlackduckSCA PR comment, BlackduckSCA FIX PR and BlackduckSCA Create SARIF is enabled.

inputs.name: blackduckScaIncludeDiagnostics
inputs.label: Include Diagnostics
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bridge CLI diagnostics will be uploaded in Artifact. Supported values: true or false

inputs.name: blackduckScaWaitForScan
inputs.label: Wait For Scan Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies if the workflow should wait for the analysis to complete. Default value: true. If set to false, post merge workflows like PR comment, Fix PR, SARIF etc will not be applicable.

inputs.name: blackduckScaPrCommentEnabled
inputs.label: Add Comments to Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add automatic pull request comment based on Black Duck SCA scan result. Supported values: true or false. Requires Azure Token.

inputs.name: blackduckScaFixPrEnabled
inputs.label: Create Fix Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Flag to enable/disable the automatic fix pull request creations for Black Duck SCA.
Default value is false

inputs.name: blackduckScaFixPrMaxCount
inputs.label: Maximum number of Pull Requests to be created
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of pull requests to be created that violate policies. PR is created for each vulnerable component

inputs.name: blackduckScaFixPrUseUpgradeGuidance
inputs.label: Configure Short Term or Long Term Guidance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Blackduck SCA upgrade guidance Values.Default is "SHORT_TERM, LONG_TERM"

inputs.name: blackduckScaFixPrFilterSeverities
inputs.label: List of SEVERITIES to be filtered
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filter the vulnerabilities by given severities, Fix PR(s) will be created only for issues where the issue severity matches one of the values specified using this option Values. Default is "CRITICAL,  HIGH".

inputs.name: blackduckScaReportsSarifCreate
inputs.label: Generate SARIF Report
inputs.helpMarkDown: SARIF report will be uploaded as a Artifact.

inputs.name: blackduckScaReportsSarifGroupSCAIssues
inputs.label: Group SCA Issues by Component
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uncheck this to disable grouping by component and list SCA issues by vulnerability.

inputs.name: blackduckScaReportsSarifFilePath
inputs.label: SARIF Report File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path (including file name) where SARIF report is created.

inputs.name: blackduckScaReportsSarifSeverities
inputs.label: SARIF Report Severities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of issue severities to include in SARIF report. Supported values: CRITICAL,HIGH,MEDIUM,LOW

inputs.name: blackduckScaScanFull
inputs.label: Scan Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specifies the scan mode to run. Auto mode runs full scan for non-PR context and rapid scan for PR context. If Full or Rapid is selected, it will run the respective scan mode for both PR and non-PR context.
**Note:** Automatic scan mode is recommended for PR Comment.

inputs.name: blackduckScaScanFailureSeverities
inputs.label: Scan Failure Severities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify scan failure severities of Black Duck SCA. Supported values: ALL, NONE, BLOCKER, CRITICAL, MAJOR, MINOR, OK, TRIVIAL, UNSPECIFIED

inputs.name: detectSearchDepth
inputs.label: Search Depth
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number indicating the search depth in the source directory

inputs.name: detectConfigPath
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Detect config file path (.properties/.yml).

inputs.name: detectArgs
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional Detect Arguments separated by space.

inputs.name: detectInstallDirectory
inputs.label: Detect Installation Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Detect installation directory on the agent where it will be installed during the build

inputs.name: detectSearchDepthForPolaris
inputs.label: Search Depth
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number indicating the search depth in the source directory.

inputs.name: DetectConfigPathForPolaris
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Detect config file path (.properties/.yml).

inputs.name: DetectArgsForPolaris
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional Detect Arguments separated by space.

inputs.name: DetectSearchDepthForSrm
inputs.label: Search Depth
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number indicating the search depth in the source directory.

inputs.name: DetectConfigPathForSrm
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Detect config file path (.properties/.yml).

inputs.name: DetectArgsForSrm
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional Detect Arguments separated by space.

inputs.name: detectExecutionPath
inputs.label: Detect Execution Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Detect execution path on the agent where it will be installed during the build.

inputs.name: srmUrl
inputs.label: URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL for SRM Server.

inputs.name: srmApikey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Key for SRM server with proper authorization

inputs.name: srmAssessmentTypes
inputs.label: Assessment Types
inputs.helpMarkDown: SRM assessment types. Supported values: SCA or SAST or both SCA, SAST

inputs.name: srmProjectDirectory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project source directory. Defaults to repository root directory. Set this to specify a custom folder that is other than repository root

inputs.name: srmMarkBuildStatus
inputs.label: Mark Build Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the build status to use if policy violating issues are found. Default value: Failed. Supported values are: Failed, SucceededWithIssues and Succeeded.

inputs.name: srmIncludeDiagnostics
inputs.label: Include Diagnostics
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bridge CLI diagnostics will be uploaded in Artifact. Supported values: true or false

inputs.name: srmWaitForScan
inputs.label: Wait For Scan Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies if the workflow should wait for the analysis to complete. Default value: true. If set to false, post merge workflows will not be applicable.

inputs.name: srmProjectName

inputs.helpMarkDown: Project name in SRM server. If not provided, Azure repository name will be set as default value.

inputs.name: srmProjectId

inputs.name: srmBranchName
